original_text: She was very beautiful. She took care of the king as his servant. But the king did not have sex with her.
korean_text: 이 처녀는 심히 아름다워 그가 왕을 받들어 시중들었으나 왕이 잠자리는 같이 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: She took care of the king
But the king did not have sex with her
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕은 그녀와 성관계를 갖지 않았다
